name: Clown In The Hole
description:
Strike up a pose and adapted to the challenge. Clown in the hole is a game for everyone!

Clown in the hole was made during Kiwijam 2021 in Wellington. The theme this year was adapt, so naturally, we went straight to a tiny clown on a train while giant alphabet blocks fall from the sky...

How to Play:

Arrow Keys = Move left / Right

Any letter on the keyboard = Strike a Pose! 

Esc to quit the game.
